entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 1:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
